mapper.insert: insert into work(workID, subject, userName, content, priority, currentProgress, workProgress, startDate, deadline, ip, admin) values (work_workID_seq.nextval, #{subject}, '돚거', #{content}, #{priority}, #{currentProgress}, #{workProgress}, #{startDate}, #{deadline}, #{ip}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rnum, AA.* FROM (SELECT * FROM work ORDER BY workID DESC) AA WHERE rownum <= #{endNo}) WHERE rnum >= #{startNo}
select * from work where priority = 1 order by workID desc
mapper.update: begin update work set subject = #{subject}, content = #{content}, priority = #{priority}, currentProgress = #{currentProgress}, workProgress = #{workProgress}, startDate = #{startDate}, deadline = #{deadline}, ip = #{ip}, updateDate = sysdate where workID = #{workID}; commit; end;
